Upgrade instructions¶

Upgrading from tar.gz package¶

  1. pip install OpenREM-version.tar.gz

  2. python path/to/openrem/manage.py schemamigration --auto remapp
    1. eg python lib/python2.7/site-packages/openrem/manage.py schemamigration --auto remapp

  3. If response to the last command is ‘Nothing seems to have changed’, no migration is reuired. Else, follow the instructions to migrate.

  4. Restart the web server, in case changes have been made to the web interface.
